column4: wow you have alot of questions in here and im just one of a million im trying to get my wireless network placed into the network area but i cant figure out how im using ndiswrapper ive already installed the driver do i have to type iwconfig wlan0 essid network then iwconfig wlan0 mode Managed then dhcpcd wlan0 all the time i think there is an easier way but im not sure i need some help please this is the first time im using ubuntu i
know alot but not enough for this system ive previously used opensuse and mandriva
long qustions with an intro aren' t likely to get answered , too much traffic
while waiting for your own question to get answered  answer someone elses
